snippet: A six-year deal with Cueto was widely reported to be worth $130 million and to include an opt-out clause after the 2017 season.
abstract: San Francisco Giants sign pitcher Johnny Cueto to six-year contract, pending physical exam results.
lead_paragraph: A six-year deal with Cueto was widely reported to be worth $130 million and to include an opt-out clause after the 2017 season.

headline.main: Giants, Rearming for Title Run, Sign Johnny Cueto
headline.print_headline: Giants, Rearming for Title Run, Sign Cueto
